page.title: 09HOME LIFE. HOLT. WORCS>
page.content: Most people live in houses with 2, 3 or 4 bedrooms. Mains gas is not available so the majority of cooking is done by means of electricity and a smaller proportion by solid fuel or liquid petroleum gas. Home life generally revolves around the garden by day and the television set in the evening for recreation. Some people grow their own vegetables even though in some instances gardens are quite small. Many families own a domestic deep freezer to store excess home produced food and locally grown produce thus alleviating daily shopping which is difficult without own transport.Diet is traditional English fare.
